about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Jose, a technology and computing enthusiast. I specialize in
about.paragraph2: with a focus on cybersecurity. I'm always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge in software development, cybersecurity, sysadmin, and machine learning. Outside of work, I enjoy exploring my creativity through music, staying active in the gym, playing soccer with friends, and reading. I'm committed to taking on new challenges and growing as a developer. I'm excited about the possibility of collaborating and growing in a team that shares my passion and vision in this exciting field. Thank you for getting to know a little more about me!
